mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart SET user_seq=#{userSeq}, product_seq=#{productSeq}, product_qty=#{productQty}, delivery_date=#{deliveryDate}, cart_cookie_id=#{cartCookieId}
mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET userSeq=#{userSeq} WHERE cart_cookie_id=#{cartCookieId}
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.user_seq, p.id, p.product_name, c.product_qty, p.product_price, (c.product_qty * p.product_price) total_price FROM cart c JOIN product p ON c.product_seq=p.id JOIN user u ON c.user_seq=u.id WHERE c.user_seq=#{userSeq} ORDER BY c.id
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(c.product_qty * p.product_price), 0) FROM cart c JOIN product p ON c.product_seq=p.id WHERE c.user_seq=#{userSeq}
SELECT product_qty FROM cart WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET product_qty=product_qty +1 WHERE id=#{id}
UPDATE cart SET product_qty=product_qty -1 WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart WHERE DATE_ADD(DATE(), INTERVAL 2 DAY) > delivery_date AND user_seq=#{userSeq}
DELETE FROM cart WHERE user_seq=#{userSeq} AND product_seq=#{productSeq}
